404_NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Not Found
404_NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: Sorry. That page you looking for doesn't exist.

500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR.TITLE: Sorry, Something went wrong.
500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: We will fix this problem soon.

ERROR.UNKNOWN: Sorry, Something went wrong. Please try again. FEEDBACK: jeonghunn1@gmail.com

SIGN_UP.TITLE: Sign Up
SIGN_UP.DESCRIPTION: Sign up to itBoard.net and synchronize all settings between all devices with simple signing in.
SIGN_UP.SERVER_TITLE: What is your API Server URL? (or IP Address)

INSTANTLY_START.TITLE: Instantly Start
INSTANTLY_START.DESCRIPTION: Just start without signing up. You can sign up later.

BUILD_YOUR_OWN_SERVER.TITLE: Build Your Own Server
BUILD_YOUR_OWN_SERVER.DESCRIPTION: itBoard is open source project. You can connect to another server or build your own.
